sentences.sContent: They wash their faces.They go to bed!
sentences.sCn: 他们洗他们的脸.他们上床睡觉！

sentences.sContent: Don't put off till tomorrow what...you put on to go to bed.
sentences.sContent_eng: Don't put off till tomorrow what...you put on to go to bed.
sentences.sCn: 别拖到明天你上床睡觉穿的。 别拖延到明天你今天能做的。

sentences.sContent: He did not go to bed until midnight.
sentences.sCn: (误)他没有上床睡觉，直到半夜。
